test_cases.name: Basic functionality: Both inputs are integers
Basic functionality: Both inputs are floats
Edge case: Large numbers
test_cases.expected_output: Error: Result is too large to compute
test_cases.test_code: assert sum_two_numbers(1e100, 1e100) == 'Error: Result is too large to compute'

test_cases.name: Error handling: Non-numeric inputs
test_cases.test_code: assert sum_two_numbers('a', 'b') == 'Error: Inputs must be numbers'
